snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is ‘outraged’ to learn of a traffic-jam vendetta. How about ‘accountable’?
abstract: Editorial asserts New Jersey Gov Chris Christie owes residents of Fort Lee an apology and swift action to remedy fallout from politically-motivated lane closings on George Washington Bridge; says Christie should begin by firing all aides and cronies who knew about scheme and that he must admit culpability, as he was either pathetically duped by his staff or in on scheme all along.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is ‘outraged’ to learn of a traffic-jam vendetta. How about ‘accountable’?
